channel.title: Help with specials please!
channel.description:
i havent found any tutorials on how to add non massing specs, but ive got a server and if u mass click the special bar, you hit like 10 times, how can i add a timer to my dds special so it cant mass spe
PS: im not a very good coder and i dont really know anything.

item.title: Help with specials please!
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

[quote=“bugra52, post:6, topic:166997”][quote author=kyled123 link=topic=226350.msg1947445#msg1947445 date=1198386626]
where do i add it at though, as i said im not a good coder - ll AT ALL ll
[/quote]

-.- I when people do this “im not a good coder”

Let me break it down for you buddy “I’m not a good programmer”[/quote]thats great, but i dont really care, this isnt english class, thanks for your spam though it was nice. now can anyone help me please?!?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2007, 06:33:13 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2007, 06:50:49 PM[/size][hr]help please!!

item.title: Help with specials please!
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

}
public void DDSSpecial()
{
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2)
{
staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 1;
SpecDamgNPC(25);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
AnimationReset = true;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(25);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else
if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3))
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
SpecDamg(25);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
startAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 4;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecialDelay -= 2;
} else
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && !DDS)
DDS = true;
else
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && DDS)
DDS = false;
else {
sendMessage(“You dont have enough power.”); }
getFilling();
}

thats my dds special now, can you put it where its supposed to go and repost it please and thank you
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2007, 06:22:57 PM[/size][hr]cmon please someone help me make my dds special not mass!

Read full topic
